name: Three Of Us
description:
Choose three heroes and dive into the forest deeps during day or night! Fight your way through the forest and enhance your deck and heroes. Reach the final boss and gain heroic points which unlock new heroes with unique abilites!

Come up with strong combinations and cleanse the world from the monsters and outcasts hiding in the forest!

Thanks for the great assets from other artists, namely:

  • Background music by PlayOnLoop.com licensed under Creative Commons by Attribution 4.0
  • Tavern background by AnthonyAvon https://www.deviantart.com/anthonyavon
  • Forest and menu backgrounds by CraftPix https://craftpix.net/
  • Card art by various artists at https://arcmage.org/artwork Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License

For the best quality, please download the game. I appreciate any kind of constructive feedback in the comments. 

Thank you for playing and enjoy the game!
